short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Live reloading web pages for madock

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will help you reload css styles without reloading web pages. The extension works in conjunction with the Madock software https://github.com/faradey/madock, which is required to deploy a local environment to work with the Magento online store. The main use is in the grunt watch on port 35729.
The extension code is completely open and lies on github.com https://github.com/faradey/livereload
